translated: The Group of Three Collections🔽The Pot-born One
the best of all those who sing,
“A gentleman knows how to praise a gentleman.
You’re the color of a tiger’s stripes.
Eat, my friend, I give to you.”

analyzed: musā vādī samāgate  vantādam kuṇapādam ca
aññam aññam pasasaka iti 🔽jambu khādaka jātakam
translated: praising each other.”🔽The Rose-apple Eater’s Jātaka is the fourth.
